p: We used REPuter to find forward and reverse repeats with minimal length of 20 bp, identity of 90%, and a Hamming distance of 3 ( Kurtz et al., 2001). SSRs were detected using MISA ( Beier et al., 2017), with the minimum number of repeat parameters set to 10, 5, 4, 3, 3, and 3 for mono-, di-, tri-, tetra-, penta-, and hexanucleotides, respectively. Tandem repeats ≥20 bp were identified using Tandem repeats finder ( Benson, 1999) with minimum alignment score of 50 and maximum period size of 500; the identity of repeats was set to ≥90%.
